name: DICE CAVE ADVENTURE
description:
Game made for GMTK GAME JAM 2022.

You are a Dice that went into cave, but got lost, so now you have to get out. Beware of the dnd dice! Its going to chase you through the whole game and will try to destroy you with the power of its dice, which can do many things, from slowing you down to summoning lightning!

Controls: move with WASD or left stick of the controller/dpad

jump with SPACE or with south button of the controller

Done by Shimp(music done by PillDrill)

I barely have any experience, but i hope i did well enough for a beginner.
